title: Replays on new client
body: How do i play a replay that i have downloaded but is not in my match history anymore. I found the downloaded files but dont know how to play them. The replays are from patch 7.2

replies.body:
Unfortunately, you can't do so very easily. There's a really janky method that has been suggested on similar threads, but I don't really recommend trying it, as it takes a lot of work and can easily be done incorrectly. In its current form, with The Replays System, you can really only view replays that are in your match history.

If you have any other questions, let me know.
Is it possible to see in-game chat with the new replay mode? If so, how?

I've messed around with Replays and haven't seen an option to toggle chat on. Maybe it's a feature you could suggest in our [**Client Discussion Boards**](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion). ^.^
